{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Zoom |model=4520 |revision= |upc=726947110298 |ean= |asin=B004GCUVH0 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=11/19/2010 |manuf_country=China |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile hotspot |fcc_id=BDN3GM1086 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=MSM7225 |cpu1_cspeed=528 |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR6002GZ |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags=3G |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=ZoomWe3G_XXX |default_ssid_regex=^ZoomWe3G_[A-Fa-f0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=admin |oui=00:26:37 |oui_eth= }} [http://www.zoomtel.com/techsupport/mobile_broadband/4520.shtml Support page] | [http://www.zoomtel.com/documentation/mobile_broadband/4520_UserManual_Eng.pdf User manual]
Uses the Samsung SWL-A205 WiFi module ([[Atheros]] AR6002GZ). :Qualcomm PW7540 on board.
The label and manual show the device with an SSID of '''ZoomWe3G_XXX'''. :The '''XXX''' is a combination of letters and numbers... :presumably the last three characters of the wireless interface MAC.
